text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the ASUS GL531GW-PB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS GL531GW-PB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS GL531GW-PB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

The ASUS GL531GW-PB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the keyboard could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS GL531GW-PB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
